short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely share files directly between devices without uploading to servers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share Panda is a free, open-source Chrome extension that allows you to easily and securely share files directly between devices without uploading them to any server first.

How to use it?
Sharing files between devices:
Turn off VPN if any.
Click "Create Stream" to generate a unique stream ID.
Share this ID with the recipient.
The recipient enters the ID and clicks "Join".
Drop a file or click to select one to send.
The file transfer will start automatically.

Share Panda facilitates direct peer-to-peer file transfers. Do not use this tool for any illegal activities. By using Share Panda, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and accept full responsibility for your actions.
